name: Lost Artefact
description:
Lost Artefact is An Adventure puzzle game where you play as Arta who seek both his parent who goes back to earth when he was a child to do some research but never comeback .


Genre : Puzzle, Adventure

Developed by At Home Studio

Teams and Jobdesk :

Bagas Azril Krisna Utama : Game Designer, Level Design, Programmer, 3D Artist
Calyptra Achmad Muchlas : UI, 3D Artist, Environment Designer
Mochamad Aditya Dipayuda : Level Designer, Sound Engineer
Muhamad Miftah Pratama : Story Writer
Wahyu Setio Rilo Pambudi : Programmer, SFX
